Text: FarewellHi Everybody Just to let you know that today is my last day at Enron I will be moving to Chicago and taking some time off before trying to figure out what to do next Over the years Ive had the pleasure working with you on various occasions It has been a great experience for me and I do regret that I have to say goodbye to you wonderful people I get to know around here Please keep in touch Here is my contact info Email VoiceMailFax Take care and wish you all the best Steve
